text: Following My Own Tracks is a single by The Whitlams from their second album, Undeniably. It is one of seven songs written by Stevie Plunder on the album. Released on 2 June 1995. ==Track listing== #Met My Match - 3:36 #Following My Own Tracks - 3:31 #Pass The Flagon - 3:32 #You'll Find a Way - 4:25 ==References== Category:The Whitlams songs Category:1995 singles Category:Songs written by Stevie Plunder
title: Following My Own Tracks
